01-02-2009, 01:49 PM crystalblue Crazy for my babe! ;) Location: Tampa 3,828 posts, read 5,083,260 times Reputation: 960 Satellite Snooping How much longer til google maps and the others give us resolution (from space) to actually see people, even their faces.
the military has it, why cant we?!?!?!
